subject: Blockchain & Web3
title: What is Ethereum?
description: Meet the world computer in 60 seconds.

hook.text: What if the internet could run programs that nobody could shut down or censor?

buildup.text: Bitcoin proved we could have unstoppable money. But what about unstoppable apps?

discovery.text: Ethereum is a blockchain that runs code. Programs called smart contracts execute automatically.

twist.text: Games, art, finance ‚Äî all running on a network of thousands of computers worldwide.

climax.text: To use Ethereum, you pay 'gas' ‚Äî small fees that keep the network running.

punchline.text: Ethereum: not just money, but a programmable world computer anyone can use.

quiz.question: What makes Ethereum different from Bitcoin?
options: It can run programs called smart contracts
